chapters.title: Chapter 10: A Blazing Beacon
chapters.info: Lieutenant Caseille Raskovni, p. 276 (326)—Under-lieutenant in the Queen's Guards of Andor. She is a lean, hard woman from Arafel. She spent twenty years as a merchant's guard, and is now a member of Elayne's personal bodyguard. Birgitte thought she would be a bannerman at heart.
